landing.hero_title: 5-Star Reviews in Seconds - No App Required üöÄ
landing.hero_subtitle_bold: Get reviews in seconds and grow your visibility.
landing.hero_subtitle: Smart Tap AI makes it easy for your customers to leave 5-star reviews almost instantly. More reviews = More trust = More sales.
landing.reviewboost_desc: More reviews mean higher ranking on Google Maps. Smart Tap AI simplifies the process: your customers scan a QR code and post a positive review instantly. No complicated steps.
landing.before_after_subtitle: See how your review collection changes from manual effort to instant results.
landing.before_desc: Customer is asked to review ‚Üí struggles to find the link ‚Üí gets writer's block ‚Üí gives up.
landing.after_desc: Scan QR ‚Üí Choose pre-crafted AI response ‚Üí 5-star review published!
landing.after_result: Result: More reviews, higher ranking, more customers
landing.why_businesses_love: Why Businesses Love Smart Tap AI
landing.step1_desc: Customer simply scans your Smart Tap AI QR.
landing.step2_desc: AI suggests ready-made SEO friendly review lines in multiple languages.
landing.step3_desc: Customer taps their preferred review, is redirected to Google Maps, and clicks paste to submit.
landing.whatsapp_chat: Still have questions? Chat on WhatsApp
landing.bonus_ai: ü§ñ Bonus: Smart AI helps generating reviews effortlessly.
landing.clients_subtitle: Real Photos of Smart Tap AI in Action
landing.clients_desc: Printed QRs on counters, standees, delivery packages, and field visits.
landing.testimonials_desc: Real words from businesses using Smart Tap AI.
landing.cta_footer_subtitle: Make review collection effortless and boost your Google ranking with Smart Tap AI.
landing.gst_included: All above plans are GST included.
landing.footer_tagline: AI-Powered Google Review Collection for Modern Businesses
landing.client1_desc: Revenue increased by 45% via digital visibility
landing.test1_text: We used to ask customers to review, but they forgot. Now with the standee, they do it while waiting. Our garage rating is 4.8 and walk-ins increased by 45%!
landing.test2_text: People love seeing that we are a genuine farm. The Google reviews help build that trust instantly, resulting in a 30% increase in weekend sales.
landing.test3_text: Foreigners find us easily on Google Maps now. Top ranking in just 30 days helped boost our revenue significantly.
landing.test4_text: Even with the rush, customers find time to scan and review. It's become a seamless part of the experience!
landing.test5_text: Generations trust us, but the digital youth checks reviews. Smart Tap AI bridged that gap perfectly.

features.ai_suggestions_desc: AI writes the review for them

pricing.title: Investment
pricing.subtitle: One plan, everything included. Start growing today.

faq.title: Questions?
faq.subtitle: We have answers
faq.a1: Yes. We focus on speed. Your customer scans, selects a positive review, and posts. It takes seconds.
faq.a2: Not at all. We set everything up for you. You just place the standee at your counter.
faq.q3: How does it help my ranking?
faq.a3: Google prefers businesses with frequent, high-quality reviews. Smart Tap AI ensures you get a steady stream of 5-star reviews with keywords.
faq.q4: What is included in the plan?
faq.a4: You get a QR standee and a digital copy of your QR code.
